column3: Latest;Kandal:  Thieves have raked in more $ 140
column4: 000 after cracking a company safe on May 29
column5: in the accounting room of RX Bricks in Prek Treng
column6: Kandal Province.------A manager at RX (Brick) said  $ 145
column7: 100 had been stolen.------Sources confirmed that at 2:55 am on May 29
column8: thieves broke through the bars of the room windows
column9: which was captured on CCTV. At 7:15 am on May 29
column10: staff members came to work and reported the break in.------In this case
column11: the provincial and district police force are cooperating and have launched an investigation to find the safe crackers.------Rasmei News
